import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import './CreditLinesSaveTabs.css' import icon from './images/ETH.png' import DropdownMenu from '../DropdownMenu' import ActivityIndicator from '../ActivityIndicator' export default function CreditLinesSaveTabs({ data, success, deposit, withdraw, requesting, depositAmount, withdrawAmount, setDepositAmount, setWithdrawAmount, dropdownData, dropdownSelected, setDropdownSelected }) { const [toggleState, setToggleState] = useState(1); const toggleTab = (index) => { setToggleState(index); } return (
toggleTab(1) }> Overview
toggleTab(2) }> Deposit
toggleTab(3) }> Withdraw
{data.assetName}
Current Deposit
{data.deposited}
Interest Earned
{data.interest}
Current APR
{data.rate}
Amount
Balance: {data.balance}
setDepositAmount(e.target.value)} value={depositAmount} />
Choose a strategy
{deposit(depositAmount)}}> {requesting ? : success ? 'OK' : `Deposit ${data.assetName}`}
Transaction Fee: {data.depositFee} ({data.depositFeeUsd})
Amount
Balance: {data.balance}
setWithdrawAmount(e.target.value)} value={withdrawAmount} />
Choose a strategy
{withdraw(withdrawAmount)}}> {requesting ? : success ? 'OK' : `Withdraw ${data.assetName}`}
Transaction Fee: {data.withdrawFee} ({data.withdrawFeeUsd})
) }
